org.sakaiproject.sitestats.api.chart

Interface ChartService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChartServiceImpl

    public interface ChartService

    • Method Detail

      • generateVisitsChart

        byte[] generateVisitsChart(String siteId,
                         String viewType,
                         int width,
                         int height,
                         boolean render3d,
                         float transparency,
                         boolean itemLabelsVisible)
        Generate a site visits chart.
        Parameters:
        siteId - The site id.
        viewType - One of StatsManager.VIEW_WEEK, StatsManager.VIEW_MONTH, StatsManager.VIEW_YEAR
        width - The chart width.
        height - The chart height.
        render3d - Render a 3D chart?
        transparency - Set chart transparency (accept values between 0.0 and 1.0)
        itemLabelsVisible - Render labels on top of bars
        Returns:
        The chart image in a byte array.
        See Also:
        StatsManager

      • generateActivityChart

        byte[] generateActivityChart(String siteId,
                           String viewType,
                           String chartType,
                           int width,
                           int height,
                           boolean render3d,
                           float transparency,
                           boolean itemLabelsVisible)
        Generate a site activity chart.
        Parameters:
        siteId - The site id.
        viewType - One of StatsManager.VIEW_WEEK, StatsManager.VIEW_MONTH, StatsManager.VIEW_YEAR
        chartType - One of StatsManager.CHARTTYPE_PIE, StatsManager.CHARTTYPE_BAR
        width - The chart width.
        height - The chart height.
        render3d - Render a 3D chart?
        transparency - Set chart transparency (accept values between 0.0 and 1.0)
        itemLabelsVisible - Render labels on top of bars
        Returns:
        The chart image in a byte array.
        See Also:
        StatsManager

      • generateChart

        byte[] generateChart(String siteId,
                   Object dataset,
                   String chartType,
                   int width,
                   int height,
                   boolean render3d,
                   float transparency,
                   boolean itemLabelsVisible,
                   String timePeriod)
        Generate a generic chart based on a know dataset.
        Parameters:
        siteId - The site id.
        dataset - A JFreeChart Dataset object
        chartType - One of StatsManager.CHARTTYPE_BAR, StatsManager.CHARTTYPE_LINE, StatsManager.CHARTTYPE_PIE
        width - The chart width.
        height - The chart height.
        render3d - Render a 3D chart?
        transparency - Set chart transparency (accept values between 0.0 and 1.0)
        itemLabelsVisible - Render labels on top of bars
        timePeriod - For TimeSeries charts, this indicates the time period unit: StatsManager.CHARTTIMESERIES_DAY, StatsManager.CHARTTIMESERIES_WEEKDAY, StatsManager.CHARTTIMESERIES_MONTH, StatsManager.CHARTTIMESERIES_YEAR
        Returns:
        The chart image in a byte array.
        See Also:
        StatsManager, Dataset

      • generateChart

        byte[] generateChart(Report report,
                   int width,
                   int height,
                   boolean render3d,
                   float transparency,
                   boolean itemLabelsVisible)
        Generate a generic chart based on an existing report definition with report data.
        Parameters:
        report - A Report object.
        width - The chart width.
        height - The chart height.
        render3d - Render a 3D chart?
        transparency - Set chart transparency (accept values between 0.0 and 1.0)
        itemLabelsVisible - Render labels on top of bars
        Returns:
        The chart image in a byte array.
        See Also:
        StatsManager, Dataset
